Warwick.Rocky Hill School:
Rocky Hill School is an independent, coeducational, college preparatory day school located on 84 acres along the Potowomut River and Narragansett Bay in East Greenwich, RI. It educates in grades nursery through grade 12 offering a rigorous curriculum with small classrooms, integrated technology, the Harkness methodology and personal college counseling.


== History ==
The school was founded in 1934 by Dorothy Marshall as a local preschool. Three years later, the first official schoolhouse was constructed to serve preschool through third grade.
